snippet: Considered by many to be the most accomplished amateur boxer in history, Teofilo Stevenson won gold in 1972, 1976 and 1980.
abstract: Cuban boxer Teofilo Stevenson, a three-time Olympic heavyweight champion with a devastating right hand and a gentlemanly demeanor, dies at 60.
lead_paragraph: Considered by many to be the most accomplished amateur boxer in history, Teofilo Stevenson won gold in 1972, 1976 and 1980.

headline.seo: Teofilo Stevenson, Olympic Boxing Champion, Dies at 60
headline.main: Teofilo Stevenson, Olympic Boxing Champion, Dies at 60
